name: Guide For Clash Royale Full
description:
"Guide for Clash Royale Full" is an reference guide that features extensive and comprehensive information about every single thing from game with complete stats and pictures.

Inside the app:
• Complete Tactics & Strategy Guide for Clash Royale
(Troops Cards, Spells Cards,Buildings Cards,King's Tower,Basics,gameplay,battles guide)
• Tips & Tricks Videos

"Guide for Clash Royale Full" is an unofficial Guide. This app is not affiliated with Clash Royale. This app acts as guide for players to have reference and better understand the game,This app not an official app or endorsed by SuperCell.
